question:
You and your family are moving to another country for work, and you are looking to buy a house there.



Write a letter to a property agent. In your letter:

Introduce yourself and your family

Describe the type of accommodation that you hope to find

Give your preference for the location of the accommodation
text: I am writing this letter to buy a house in Sydney, Australia.
I am John. Recently, I have got a job in Sydney. So, I am planning to move with my family. My two children and wife will also come with me to Australia. I need your help to buy a house in Australia.

Firstly, I am looking for a two-bedroom flat. Moreover, a fully furnished apartment will be a good option because I don't think, I can spend much time buying the furniture and necessary things. Furthermore, it will be good if it has one playing room for kids and a balcony. In addition to that, it should have one parking space, as I was thinking, I will have to buy a car, maybe after two months.

Although, I have got a job near the Mascot suburb. So, it will be great if you can arrange the apartment either in the Mascot or nearby suburbs like Glebe or Surry Hills because I don't want to move very far from my job location It will be helpful if you can help me to find such kind of an apartment.
I will wait for your response.
